Bibliographic References: Passeri, pi. 128; LCS, p. 204, no. 33, pi. 80, 3; Suppl. Ill, p. 99, no. 58.
Imagery Description: (a) Young satyr with tambourine, bending forward in front of seated meanad with thyrsus, (b) maenad running to r., with thyrsus in r. hand, cista and fillet in l.
Additional Notes: The head of the thyrsus carried by the maenad on the reverse finds a close parallel in that held by the youth to l. on the reverse of Madrid 11026 (no. 6).
